title: Gold 4 Player searching for ranked team :)
body:
Hi Community :)
I am a 17 year old gold 4 player and i search for a ranked team :)
I am from Germany, but i post in english, because i am also interested in playing with english speaking people to get a good english skill xD
So just left a comment below if you want to play with me :) I play like 4 Games everyday from 2pm cet till 6pm cet.
I search for an active team so i want to play on 2 days a week i guess :) So we can go up for Platin or something like that :)
Greatings from Germany Nils aka. IceRising

Oh forgot my Lane xD I play ADC :)
